title: Newly Renovated Junior 1x1 Apartment home!
posting_body: In-person and virtual tours are available!
1190 Mission Street at Trinity Place is a luxurious, modern building right in the center of SOMA.
Our well-designed apartment homes come equipped with full-size kitchens, including a dishwasher and garbage disposal.
The modern white cabinets on white walls and black granite countertops give our homes a trendy and sleek atmosphere.
The walnut laminate floors add warmth and texture.
The spacious floor plan in the junior one-bedroom apartment homes offers privacy with a beautiful city view.
You cannot go wrong in any home!
Our community has a large gym and a secluded outdoor plaza where you can picnic in the San Francisco sun.
We offer 24-hour front desk attendants as well as on-site maintenance for daily work orders and emergencies.
You will feel confident that you are in a home that provides all your needs.
Features:
-Whole Foods in our Community!
-Amazon Package Locker Room
- Muni and BART station on the same block
-Walk Score of 95, Biker's Score of 97, Transit Score of 100
-Walk-in closets
-Granite countertops
-Spectacular city views
-Direct access from the building into the secluded Piazza courtyard
-24-hour front desk associates
-State-of-the-Art Fitness center
-Laundry on every floor
-Parking spaces available for rent in an enclosed garage
-Direct access from the building into the garage
-Pets allowed subject to company guidelines
-No smoking
-Pictures/Virtual tour of similar apartment shown

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
